mapper.select: SELECT users.id, email, sex, age, name, like_point, member_status, registed, height, residence, occupation, annual_income, marital_status, desire_to_marry, holiday, smoking, housemate FROM users LEFT JOIN user_required_details ON users.id = user_required_details.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, sex, age, name, registed) VALUES (#{email}, #{sex}, #{age}, #{name}, NOW())
